mapper.update: update gms_goods set view_count = view_count+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT g.id,g.name,g.seller,g.description,g.price,g.view_count,g.is_on_sell,g.create_time,g.update_time,g.default_img,c.name as categoryName FROM gms_goods g LEFT JOIN gms_category c on g.cid = c.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT g.id,g.cid,g.name,g.seller,g.description,g.price,g.view_count,g.is_on_sell,g.create_time,g.update_time,g.default_img,g.seller_id FROM gms_goods g WHERE g.id = #{id}
select id from gms_goods where seller_id = #{memberId}
select id,name from gms_category where parent_cid in (select id from gms_category where parent_cid = #{categoryId})
